name: Escalate Mall RPG
description:
This is an RPG where you use the stores around you to survive the dangerous escalators because you have to get the free ice cream at the other end of the mall.

All sounds taken from Soundly

Sprites are from open game art users Damian Gasinski aka Gassasin, Antifarea and lorc .

To move Click Inside Blue Circle around your character and Drag the mouse in the direction you want to go.

Team Includes Just Me

GameingOxide or dsaucier@gmail.com
